spell_tooltip.description: Casts down the enemy with a bolt of Holy Light, causing 695,609 Holy damage and preventing the target from causing critical effects for the next 8 sec.

When you Cleanse an ally, 1 ally within 40 yds is dispelled of the same effects, but the cooldown of Cleanse is increased by 4 sec.

Healing allies with your Flash of Light or Holy Light will cleanse all Diseases and Poisons from the target.
Every 5 sec the healing done by your next Light of Dawn is increased by 20%. Stacks up to 5 times.

Heals a friendly target for an amount equal to 100% your maximum health.

Grants the target 30% increased armor for 8 sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Learn Concentration Aura, Devotion Aura, and Crusader Aura:

Concentration Aura:
Interrupt and Silence effects on party and raid members within 40 yds are 30% shorter. 

 Devotion Aura:
Party and raid members within 40 yds are bolstered by their devotion, reducing damage taken by 3%.

 Crusader Aura:
Increases mounted speed by 20% for all party and raid members within 40 yds.

Hurls a divine hammer that strikes an enemy for 196,922 Holy damage. Only usable on enemies that have less than 20% health.

Generates 1 Holy Power.
Cleanse additionally removes all Disease and Poison effects.
Lay on Hands grants the target 30% increased armor for 8 sec and now ignores healing reduction effects.
Emits dazzling light in all directions, blinding enemies within 10 yds, causing them to wander disoriented for 6 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
After Cleanse successfully removes an effect from an ally, they are healed for 512,024.
After you spend 20 Holy Power, your next Word of Glory echoes onto a nearby ally at 30% effectiveness.
Leap atop your Charger for 5 sec, increasing movement speed by 100%. Usable while indoors or in combat.
Judgment deems the target unworthy, preventing the next 125,817 damage dealt by the target.
Divine Steed now has 2 charges.
Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to movement impairing effects for 8 sec.
Interrupts spellcasting and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Speed increased by 2% and damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 2%.
Instantly cast Holy Shock on up to 5 targets within 30 yds.

Blessing of Freedom increases the target's movement speed by 30%. Blessing of Protection and Blessing of Sacrifice reduce the target's damage taken by 15%. These effects linger for 8 sec after the Blessing ends.
Armor increased by 24%, Stamina increased by 12% and damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 7%.

Blesses a party or raid member, reducing their damage taken by 30%, but you suffer 100% of damage prevented.

Last 12 sec, or until transferred damage would cause you to fall below 20% health.
Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 15 sec.

Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to Physical damage and harmful effects for 10 sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.
Armor and critical strike chance increased by 4%.
Reduces the cooldown of Blessing of Sacrifice by 15 sec.
Holy Power spending abilities have a 15% chance to make your next Holy Power spending ability free and deal 15% increased damage and healing.
Reduces the cooldown of your Divine Shield, Divine Protection, and Lay on Hands by 30%.

Divine Steed reduces the cooldown of 4 nearby ally's major movement ability by 3.0 sec.

Your movement speed is increased by 3%.
Allies are healed for 93,951 when you cast a Blessing spell on them and healed again for 95,402 when the blessing ends.
Judgment causes the next 5 successful attacks against the target to heal the attacker for 15,294.
Word of Glory grants 20% bonus armor for 4.5 sec.
Mastery increased by 4% and intellect increased by 4%.
Hammer of Wrath deals 25% increased damage to enemies below 35% health.
Flash of Light and Holy Light are 10% more effective on your allies and 10% of the healing done also heals you.

When you cast 3 Holy Power generating abilities, you gain Blessing of Dawn. When you consume Blessing of Dawn, you gain Blessing of Dusk.

Blessing of Dawn
Your next Holy Power spending ability deals 15% additional increased damage and healing. This effect stacks.

Blessing of Dusk
Damage taken reduced by 4% For 10 sec.

Triggers a burst of Light on the target, dealing 198,637 Holy damage to an enemy, or 336,952 healing to an ally.

Generates 1 Holy Power.
Word of Glory and Light of Dawn gain up to 30% additional chance to critically strike, based on their target's current health. Lower health targets are more likely to be critically struck.
Unleashes a wave of Holy energy, healing up to 5 injured allies within a 15 yd frontal cone for 178,465.
Holy Shock now has 2 charges and it refunds 50% of its mana cost when cast on an enemy.

Empowers your chosen aura for 8 sec.

Devotion Aura: Damage reduction increased to 12%.
Mastery: Lightbringer now increases your healing based on the target's proximity to either you or your Beacon of Light, whichever is closer.
Casting Flash of Light or Holy Light grants 1 Holy Power.
Lay on Hands' cooldown is reduced by 1.5 sec per Holy Power spent and restores 5% of your Mana.
Each Holy Power spent on Word of Glory increases the healing of your next Light of Dawn by 5%, up to a maximum of 45%.
Holy Shock, Holy Light, and Flash of Light critical healing increased by 20%.

Imbue a friendly target with a Barrier of Faith, absorbing 455,862 damage for 12 sec. For the next 24 sec, Barrier of Faith accumulates 20% of effective healing from your Flash of Light, Holy Light, or Holy Shock spells. Every 6 sec, the accumulated healing becomes an absorb shield.
Aura Mastery also increases all healing received by party or raid members within 40 yards by 10%.
Consuming Infusion of Light reduces the cooldown of Holy Shock by 1.0 sec.
After casting Barrier of Faith or Holy Prism, the healing of your next Holy Light or Flash of Light is increased by 20%, its cast time is reduced by 30%, and its mana cost is reduced by 50%.

When an ally with your Beacon of Light is damaged below 50% health, they absorb the next 820,551 damage.

You cannot shield the same person this way twice within 1 min.
Allies with Beacon of Light receive 5% less damage.
30% of Holy Shock's overhealing is converted into an absorb shield. The shield amount cannot exceed 10% of your max health.
Beacon of Light transfers an additional 5% of the amount healed.
Spending Holy Power has a 25% chance to trigger Saved by the Light's absorb effect at 33% effectiveness without activating its cooldown.
While empowered by Infusion of Light, Flash of Light heals for an additional 20%, and Holy Light or Judgment refund 0.5% of your maximum mana.

Apply a Beacon of Light to your target and 4 injured allies within 30 yds for 8 sec.

All affected allies will be healed for 15% of the amount of your other healing done.

Judgment empowers your next Word of Glory to automatically activate Light of Dawn with 25% increased effectiveness.

This effect can only occur every 20 sec.

Hammer of Wrath heals up to 5 injured allies for 280% of the damage done, split evenly among them.

Flash of Light, Holy Light, and Judgment critical strikes reset the cooldown of Hammer of Wrath and make it usable on any target, regardless of their health.
Call upon the Light to become an avatar of retribution, reducing Holy Shock's cooldown by 50%, increasing your damage, healing, and critical strike chance by 15% for 25 sec.
Crusader Strike reduces the cooldown of Holy Shock and Judgment by 2.0 sec.
Avenging Wrath and Avenging Crusader reduce Holy Shock's cooldown by 50%, and have 25% increased duration.

After casting Avenging Wrath, your next 2 Holy Shocks cast 2 additional times.

After casting Divine Toll, your next 2 Holy Shocks cast 2 additional times.
Holy Shock has a 12% chance to refund a charge when cast and its healing is increased by 10%.

Bless an ally for 30 sec, causing 12% of all healing to be converted into damage onto a nearby enemy and 12% of all damage to be converted into healing onto an injured ally within 40 yds.

Blessing of the Seasons: Turns to Autumn after use.

Infusion of Light has 1 additional charge, increases Greater Judgment's effect by an additional 50%, Flash of Light's healing is increased by an additional 15%, and Holy Light's healing is increased by an additional 15%.

Will the Light to coalesce and become manifest as a Holy Armament, wielded by your friendly target.

 Holy Bulwark:

While wielding a Holy Bulwark, gain an absorb shield for 15.0% of your max health and an additional 2.0% every 2 sec. Lasts 20 sec.

Becomes Sacred Weapon after use.

Imbue your weapon with the power of the Light, increasing your Stamina by 3% and causing your Holy Power abilities to sometimes unleash a burst of healing around a target.

Lasts 1 hour.

If you bestow an Armament upon an ally, you also gain its benefits.

If you bestow an Armament upon yourself, a nearby ally also gains its benefits.
For each Holy Power ability cast, your next Consecration deals 273,517 damage or healing immediately, split across all enemies and allies.
When an Armament fades from you, the cooldown of Lay on Hands is reduced by 15.0 sec and you gain Infusion of Light.
The cooldown of Holy Armaments is reduced by 20%.

When you or an ally wielding a Holy Bulwark are healed above maximum health, transfer 100% of the overhealing to your ally.

When you or an ally wielding a Sacred Weapon drop below 40% health, redistribute your health immediately and every 1 sec for 4 sec. May only occur once per cast.
The effect of your active Aura is increased by 33% on targets with your Armaments.
Consuming Infusion of Light reduces the cooldown of Holy Armaments by 3.0 sec.
Judgment critical strikes cause a shockwave around the target, dealing 464,236 healing at the target's location.
Avenging Wrath summons an additional Sacred Weapon, and during Avenging Wrath your Sacred Weapon casts spells on your target and echoes the effects of your Holy Power abilities.
The light reveals all enemies in stealth or invisible to you while under the effects of Divine Shield. This effect lingers for 20 sec after Divine Shield fades.
Lightbearer's healing transfer is increased by up to 150% based on your current health. Lower health heals allies for more.

Your allies affected by your Aura gain an effect after you cast Blessing of Protection or Blessing of Freedom.

 Blessing of Protection
Physical damage reduced by 30% for 6 sec.

 Blessing of Freedom
Cleared of all movement impairing effects.

Heals a friendly target for an amount equal to 100% your maximum health.

Grants the target 30% increased armor for 8 sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Learn Concentration Aura, Devotion Aura, and Crusader Aura:

Concentration Aura:
Interrupt and Silence effects on party and raid members within 40 yds are 30% shorter. 

 Devotion Aura:
Party and raid members within 40 yds are bolstered by their devotion, reducing damage taken by 3%.

 Crusader Aura:
Increases mounted speed by 20% for all party and raid members within 40 yds.

Hurls a divine hammer that strikes an enemy for 194,467 Holy damage. Only usable on enemies that have less than 20% health.

Generates 1 Holy Power.
Hammer of Justice's cooldown is reduced by 15 sec.
Emits dazzling light in all directions, blinding enemies within 10 yds, causing them to wander disoriented for 6 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.

The cooldown of Lay on Hands is reduced up to 60%, based on the target's missing health.

Word of Glory's healing is increased by up to 100% on yourself, based on your missing health.
Leap atop your Charger for 5 sec, increasing movement speed by 100%. Usable while indoors or in combat.

Judgment causes the target to take 20% increased damage from your next Holy Power ability.

Multiple applications may overlap.
Divine Steed now has 2 charges.

Divine Steed also grants Blessing of Freedom for 3.0 sec.

 Blessing of Freedom:
Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to movement impairing effects for 8 sec.
Interrupts spellcasting and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Speed increased by 2% and damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 2%.
Instantly cast Holy Shock on up to 5 targets within 30 yds.
Blessing of Freedom increases movement speed by 30%, and you gain Blessing of Freedom when cast on a friendly target.
Armor increased by 24%, Stamina increased by 12% and damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 7%.

Blesses a party or raid member, reducing their damage taken by 30%, but you suffer 100% of damage prevented.

Last 12 sec, or until transferred damage would cause you to fall below 20% health.
After casting Divine Toll, you instantly cast Holy Shock every 5 sec for 15 sec.

Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to Physical damage and harmful effects for 10 sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.
Armor and critical strike chance increased by 4%.
Reduces the cooldown of Blessing of Sacrifice by 15 sec.
Holy Power spending abilities have 2% increased damage and healing.
Reduces the cooldown of your Divine Shield, Divine Protection, and Lay on Hands by 30%.
Divine Storm heals you and up to 2 nearby allies for 1.0% of maximum health.
Allies are healed for 92,700 when you cast a Blessing spell on them and healed again for 92,571 when the blessing ends.
Divine Protection increases healing taken by 15% for its duration.
Judgment causes the next 5 successful attacks against the target to heal the attacker for 15,256.
Word of Glory grants 20% bonus armor for 4.5 sec.
Mastery increased by 4% and intellect increased by 4%.
Hammer of Wrath deals 60% increased damage to enemies below 35% health.
Consecration heals you and 5 allies within it for 3,944 every 0.9 sec.

When you cast 3 Holy Power generating abilities, you gain Blessing of Dawn. When you consume Blessing of Dawn, you gain Blessing of Dusk.

Blessing of Dawn
Your next Holy Power spending ability deals 15% additional increased damage and healing. This effect stacks.

Blessing of Dusk
Damage taken reduced by 4% For 10 sec.

Pierce an enemy with a blade of light, dealing 227,735 Holy damage.

Generates 1 Holy Power.

Unleashes a whirl of divine energy, dealing 109,695 Holy damage to all nearby enemies. 

Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Reduces the cooldown of Judgment by 2 sec and Crusader Strike by 2 sec.
Your Blade of Justice causes the target to burn for 74,073 Radiant damage over 9 sec.
Blade of Justice now has 2 charges.

Unleashes a powerful weapon strike that deals 199,995 Holy damage to an enemy target,

Final Verdict has a 15% chance to reset the cooldown of Hammer of Wrath and make it usable on any target, regardless of their health.

When your health is brought below 25%, you instantly cast a free Word of Glory at 60% effectiveness on yourself.

Cannot occur more than once every 60 sec.

Your auto attacks have a 20% chance to reset the cooldown of Blade of Justice.

Critical strikes increase the chance by an additional 10%.

Templar's Verdict and Blade of Justice deal 10% increased damage.

The range of Blade of Justice is increased to 20 yds.
Call upon the Light to become an avatar of retribution, reducing Holy Shock's cooldown by 50%, increasing your damage, healing, and critical strike chance by 15% for 25 sec.
Auto-attack speed increased by 40%.
Judgment now has 2 charges.

Crusader Strike replaces your auto-attacks and deals 45,829 Physical damage, but now only generates 1 Holy Power every 2 attacks.

Inherits Crusader Strike benefits but cannot benefit from Skyfury.

Blade of Justice now hits nearby enemies for 108,998 Holy damage. 

Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Crusader Strike and auto-attacks deal 20% increased damage and deal 20% increased critical strike damage.
Mastery: Highlord's Judgment is 50% more effective on Judgment and Hammer of Wrath. Judgment applies an additional stack of Greater Judgment if it is known.

Lash out at your enemies, dealing 279,177 Radiant damage to all enemies within 14 yds in front of you, and applying Truth's Wake, burning the targets for an additional 152,899 damage over 9 sec.

Demon and Undead enemies are also stunned for 5 sec.

Generates 3 Holy Power.
Crusader Strike and Judgment hit an additional 4 targets but deal 25% reduced damage to secondary targets.

Creates a barrier of holy light that absorbs 2.6 million damage for 10 sec.

When the shield expires, it bursts to inflict Holy damage equal to the total amount absorbed, divided among all nearby enemies.
Your damage over time effects deal 10% more damage.

Call down a blast of heavenly energy, dealing 479,134 Holy damage to all targets in the area and causing them to take 30% increased damage from your single target Holy Power abilities, and 15% increased damage from other Holy Power abilities for 12 sec.
Wake of Ashes deals significantly reduced damage to secondary targets, but now causes you to lash out 2 extra times for 179,504 Radiant damage.
Divine Storm, Divine Hammer and Consecration now deal Radiant damage and your abilities that deal Radiant damage deal 5% increased damage.
Final Reckoning and Execution Sentence's durations are increased by 4 sec.
Final Reckoning and Execution Sentence grant 3 Holy Power.

Avenging Wrath is replaced with Radiant Glory.

Radiant Glory
Wake of Ashes activates Avenging Wrath for 10 sec.

Each Holy Power spent has a chance to activate Avenging Wrath for 5 sec.

When Truth's Wake critically strikes, its duration is extended by 2 sec.

Your other damage over time effects deal 30% increased damage to targets affected by Truth's Wake.

Highlord's Judgment and Radiant damage abilities have a chance to call down an explosion of Holy Fire dealing 170,675 Radiant damage to all nearby enemies and leaving a Consecration in its wake. 

Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
While a Dawnlight is active, your Holy Power spenders deal 5% additional damage or healing.

Heals an ally for 752,377 and an additional 107,971 over 16 sec.

Healing increased by 25% when cast on self.
Critical Strike chance of Holy Shock and Light of Dawn increased by 5%.

Movement speed increased by 5% while above 80% health.

When your health is brought below 35%, your movement speed is increased by 40% for 5 sec. Cannot occur more than once every 1 min.
Your damage and healing over time effects have a chance to increase the healing or damage of your next Holy Shock by 200%.
Holy Shock and Light of Dawn critical strikes cause the target to be healed for an additional 70,919 over 4 sec.

After you cast Holy Prism or Barrier of Faith, gain Divine Purpose.

 Divine Purpose
Your next Holy Power spending ability is free and deals 15% increased damage and healing.
Your Haste is increased by 2% for 12 sec each time you apply Dawnlight. Multiple stacks may overlap.
Light of Dawn and Holy Shock have a 15% chance to cast again at 30% effectiveness.

During Avenging Wrath, you become linked to your Dawnlights, causing 19,693 Radiant damage to enemies or 17,664 healing to allies that pass through the beams, reduced beyond 5 targets.

Activating Avenging Wrath applies up to 4 Dawnlights onto nearby allies or enemies and increases Dawnlight's duration by 20%.

Sun's Avatar's healing does not transfer to Beacon of Light.
